é€çº§é€’å‡â€”â€”1 return(1) } else if (all(diff(as.numeric(data)) > 0)) { # é€çº§é€’å¢â€”â€”2 return(2) } else if (length(data) ==3 & diff(as.numeric(data))[1] > 0 & diff(as.numeric(data))[2] < 0) { # æ²¡æœ‰è¶‹åŠ¿â€”â€”0 return(0) }}pacman::p_load(lmbio, dplyr)dataname <- "./Venn.xlsx"# sheetname <- "å¹¶é›†"sheetname <- "äº¤é›†"sample <- readdata("./æ•°æ®çŸ©é˜µ.xlsx", sheet = "åˆ†ç»„")data <- readdata(dataname, sheet = sheetname)[c("Metabolites", sample$Sample)]averadata <- merge(as.data.frame(t(data)), sample, by.x = "row.names", by.y = "Sample")[, -1]colnames(averadata) <- c(t(data)[1, ], "Group")cols <- grep("Group", colnames(averadata))# ä½¿ç”¨ lapply() å‡½æ•°å¯¹è¿™äº›åˆ—åº”ç”¨ as.numeric() å‡½æ•°averadata[-cols] <- lapply(averadata[, -cols], as.numeric)result <- averadata %>% group_by(Group) %>% summarise_all(mean)averadata <- t(result)[-1, ] %>% as.data.frame(.)colnames(averadata) <- t(result)[1, ]averadata <- averadata[unique(sample$Group)]averadata$up_down <- apply(averadata, 1, function(x) { abundance_range(x) })out_avera <- as.data.frame(lapply(averadata, as.numeric))rownames(out_avera) <- rownames(averadata)colnames(out_avera) <- colnames(averadata)# é€‰å–è¶‹åŠ¿ä¸Šä¸‹çš„è¿›è¡Œä¿å­˜out <- list()out[["union_down"]] <- merge(subset(out_avera, up_down == 3), data, by.x = "row.names", by.y = "Metabolites", all.x = T, sort = FALSE) %>% rename(Metabolites = Row.names)out[["union_up"]] <- merge(subset(out_avera, up_down == 4), data, by.x = "row.names", by.y = "Metabolites", all.x = T, sort = FALSE) %>% rename(Metabolites = Row.names)out[["union_up_down"]] <- merge(subset(out_avera, up_down == 3 | up_down == 4), data, by.x = "row.names", by.y = "Metabolites", all.x = T, sort = FALSE) %>% rename(Metabolites = Row.names)savexlsx(out, "venn.xlsx")

title: ğŸ˜°Python
content: This is a python test é…ç½® python -m pip install pandas â€”â€”å®‰è£…æ¨¡å— å®ç”¨ä»£ç  æ•°æ®å¤„ç† æ–‡ä»¶å¤¹ è¿”å›å½“å‰å·¥ä½œç›®å½•â€”â€”os.getcwd() è¡¨æ ¼ ex = pd.ExcelFile(file)â€”â€”ex.sheet_names()â€”â€”è¯»å–sheet data= pd.read_excel(ex,sheet,index_col)â€”â€”è¯»å–æ–‡ä»¶ df1=pd.read_csv(â€œ.\ppi-test-8860\A_B\ppi_nodes.xlsâ€,sep=â€œ\tâ€)â€”â€”è¯»å–xlsæ–‡ä»¶ data.columnsâ€”â€”åˆ—å data.indexâ€”â€”è¡Œç´¢å¼• data.loc[:,[â€œâ€,â€œâ€]]â€”â€”æå–åŒ…å«åˆ— data.iloc[0, 0]â€”â€”å–ç¬¬å‡ è¡Œå‡ åˆ— df = df.assign(column_new_1=np.nan, column_new_2=â€˜dogsâ€™, column_new_3=3)â€”â€”æ·»åŠ å¤šåˆ— æ•°æ®è½¬åŒ– äºŒç»´åˆ—è¡¨è½¬åŒ–ä¸ºä¸€ç»´åˆ—è¡¨â€”â€”listA=[x for j in listB for x in j] setç±»å‹â€”â€”æ’é™¤é‡å¤å…ƒç´  ç»Ÿè®¡ä¸ªæ•°â€”â€”Counter(la)â€“from collections import Counter æ•°ç»„å½¢å¼â€”â€”data.items() æ’åºâ€”â€”dpro = sorted(dproscore.items(), key=lambda x: x[1])â€“ä»å°åˆ°å¤§ å°†è¡¨è½¬åŒ–ä¸ºå­—å…¸â€”â€”dict(zip(df.iloc[:,0],df.iloc[:,1])) åˆ›å»ºæ–°å¯¹è±¡èµ‹å€¼â€”â€”a.copy() ä¸€è¡Œå½¢å¼çš„forå¾ªç¯â€”â€”[x for x in a] å­—ç¬¦å¤„ç† ä½¿ç”¨æ­£åˆ™è¡¨è¾¾å¼è¿›è¡ŒåŒ¹é…â€”â€”re.search(â€œ0-9â€,line) å°†å­—å…¸çš„ä¸€ä¸ªé”®å¯¹åº”çš„å¤šä¸ªå€¼å‰éƒ½æ·»åŠ ç›¸åŒçš„å­—ç¬¦â€”â€”dic_g[i] = [org + str(x) for x in dic_g[i]] rstripâ€”â€”å»é™¤æœ«å°¾å­—ç¬¦ä¸² åŒ¹é…ç‰¹å®šæ–‡ä»¶åç¼€â€”â€”[x for x in a if re.search(r".py$â€œ,x)] åˆ—è¡¨æ›¿æ¢â€”[x.replace(â€œpath:â€,â€") for x in a] å›¾ç‰‡ç»˜åˆ¶ å›¾ä¾‹ç´§éšå…¶åâ€”â€”savefig(â€˜{compare}.pdfâ€™.format(compare=name),dpi=300,bbox_inches=â€˜tightâ€™) è®¾ç½®ç”»æ¿èƒŒæ™¯â€”â€”plt.figure(figsize=(7, 5.6),facecolor=â€˜whiteâ€™)â€” çˆ¬è™« çˆ¬å–æ•°æ®â€”â€”response=requests.get(url, headers=self.headers) urlâ€”ç½‘å€ headersâ€”response.status_code == 200â€”å“åº”æ­£å¸¸ response.textâ€”htmlæ ¼å¼çš„æ–‡æœ¬å½¢å¼ å…¶ä»– å­—ç¬¦ä¸²å‰åŠ  f çš„æ„æ€æ ¼å¼åŒ– {} å†…å®¹ï¼Œä¸åœ¨ {} å†…çš„ç…§å¸¸å±•ç¤ºè¾“å‡ºï¼Œå¦‚æœä½ æƒ³è¾“å‡º {}ï¼Œé‚£å°±ç”¨åŒå±‚ {{}} å°†æƒ³è¾“å‡ºçš„å†…å®¹åŒ…èµ·æ¥ã€‚

title: Hello World
content: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick Start Create a new post 1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server 1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files 1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites 1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
